page.title: 04BROMPTON - EMPLOYMENT
page.content: Employment in Brompton is varied; covering all aspects of industry, primary,secondary and tertiary.The small,versatile,self-contained industrial units provide work for approximately 20 employees each on a full-time basis.The local Primary School and Nursery unit supplies tertiary employment for approximately 10 teachers and auxiliary staff. Farming provides full_time and seasonal employment for the inhabitants.Much of the population, including many women, who work in Brompton,are employed on a part_time basis particularly in leisure connected industries.The majority of the work_force is employed outside of its own residential area,usually within a 30mile radius. Northallerton, Darlington and Teesside provide employment for many people.
